+# Template loading
+default_template_dir = Path(__file__).parent / 'templates'
+override_template_dir = os.getenv('PROMPT_TEMPLATE_DIR')
+search_paths = [p for p in [override_template_dir, default_template_dir] if p]
+env = Environment(loader=FileSystemLoader([str(p) for p in search_paths]))
+
+def render_prompt(name, **kwargs):
+    template = env.get_template(name)
+    return template.render(**kwargs)
+
+def get_content_type_prompt(content_type, **kwargs):
+    kwargs.setdefault('kind', content_type)
+    template_name = f'content_types/{content_type.upper()}.j2'
+    try:
+        return render_prompt(template_name, **kwargs)
+    except TemplateNotFound:
+        return render_prompt('content_types/FAQ.j2', **kwargs)
